lyrics:
7 contributorsi’ll be your strength lyricsverse 1 jay
this is not gonna last forever
it’s that time when you must hold on
and i won’t let you surrender
and i’ll heal you if you’re broken

prechorus nathan
we can stand so tall together
we can make it through the stormy weather
we can go through it all together do it all together do it all

chorus nathan
i’ll be your strength
i will i will i will
i’ll be your strength
yes i will yes i will

verse 2 tom
i won’t sleep till the sky is calmer
keep on searching till i find you
and my love will be your armor
in this battlefield around you

prechorus nathan
we can stand so tall together
we can make it through the stormy weather
we can go through it all together do it all together do it all
you might also likechorus nathan
i’ll be your strength
i will i will i will
i’ll be your strength
yes i will yes i will

bridge all
hold on hold on
i’ll be there soon
so hold on hold on
i’ll be there soon
so hold on hold on
i’ll be there soon
so hold on hold on
i’ll be there

chorus nathan  all
i’ll be your strength
i will i will be
i’ll be your strength
i’ll be i’ll be
i’ll be your strength
i’ll be i’ll be
i’ll be your strength
i’ll be i’ll be
outro max
i’ll be your strength
i’ll be strong for you
i’ll be your strength
and i’ll keep strong for you1embed
